                          String pattern)
                   throws NullPointerException,
                          WrapRuntimeException

Parameters:
text - the text
pattern - the pattern for SimpleDateFormat
Returns:
the converted value
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the pattern parameter is null
WrapRuntimeException - if an error occurred while parsing the text
